description: Yttrium is a rare-earth metal used in phosphors, lasers, and high-strength alloys. Its compounds help produce bright red colors in displays and improve performance in superconducting materials. Yttrium-stabilized ceramics withstand high temperatures and mechanical stress. Although not found pure in nature, it is extracted from rare-earth minerals. Its unique combination of optical and structural properties supports many advanced technologies.
name: Yttrium
